repos_data.description: Simple Swift wrapper for Keychain that works on iOS, watchOS, tvOS and macOS.
Valet lets you securely store data in the iOS, tvOS, or macOS Keychain without knowing a thing about how the Keychain works. Itâ€™s easy. We promise.
UICKeyChainStore is a simple wrapper for Keychain on iOS, watchOS, tvOS and macOS. Makes using Keychain APIs as easy as NSUserDefaults.
